description: This file defines a React component named NoteDialog used for creating or editing notes within a note organization application. It manages form inputs for title, content, category, and tags, handles user interactions, and calls callbacks for saving or canceling the dialog.

methods.name: NoteDialog({ open, mode, note, categories, allTags, onSave, onCancel, saving })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a modal dialog for note creation or editing, with state management and event handling.

ctags.name: NoteDialog
ctags.pattern: /^function NoteDialog({ open, mode, note, categories, allTags, onSave, onCancel, saving }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ open, mode, note, categories, allTags, onSave, onCancel, saving })
